# Z-Flow - Engineering Studio Berlin
# MVP Development, n8n Automation & AI Integration Agency

## Who We Are
Z-Flow is an engineering studio and software agency based in Berlin, Germany. We specialize in:
- MVP development for startups and non-technical founders
- Workflow automation with n8n and Make.com
- AI integration (OpenAI, Claude, LLM solutions)
- No-code development with WeWeb, Xano, Supabase

Founded by Mahmoud Sheikh Alard. We serve startups, SMEs, and the German Mittelstand.

## Our Services

### MVP Development Agency
We build MVPs (Minimum Viable Products) for startups and founders who want to validate ideas fast.
- **Tech stack**: Next.js, React, TypeScript OR No-Code (WeWeb + Xano/Supabase)
- **What's included**: Web app, responsive design, user authentication, backend, deployment, documentation
- **Timeline**: 2-6 weeks
- **Price**: From €15,000 (fixed price)
- **Ideal for**: Non-technical founders, first-time founders, startup MVP validation

### n8n Developer & Automation Expert
We are certified n8n developers and Make.com experts offering workflow automation services.
- **Platforms**: n8n (self-hosted or cloud), Make.com, Zapier alternatives
- **Capabilities**: API integrations, webhooks, data sync, CRM automation, lead management, invoice automation
- **GDPR compliant**: Self-hosted n8n setups available
- **Timeline**: 1-3 weeks
- **Price**: From €3,000

### AI Integration Services
We integrate AI into business applications and workflows.
- **Technologies**: OpenAI API, Claude API, LangChain, RAG systems, vector databases
- **Use cases**: AI chatbots, document processing, content generation, voice agents (11Labs)
- **Approach**: Human-in-the-loop, explainable AI, privacy-first

### No-Code Development
Expert WeWeb developers and Xano backend specialists.
- **Frontend**: WeWeb (visual web app builder)
- **Backend**: Xano (no-code backend), Supabase
- **Database**: Airtable, PostgreSQL, Supabase

### Training & Workshops
Learn to build and maintain automation and no-code solutions yourself.
- **Topics**: n8n, Make.com, WeWeb, Xano, No-Code stack
- **Format**: Remote or on-site, half-day to multi-day
- **Price**: From €1,500

### Fractional CTO / Tech Partner
Technical leadership for startups without a technical cofounder.
- **Services**: Architecture decisions, tech strategy, vendor selection, team hiring
- **Format**: Monthly retainer from €4,000

## Technologies We Use
- **Automation**: n8n, Make.com
- **Frontend**: Next.js, React, WeWeb
- **Backend**: Xano, Supabase, Node.js
- **Database**: PostgreSQL, Supabase, Airtable
- **AI**: OpenAI, Claude, 11Labs, LangChain
- **Deployment**: Vercel

## Location & Contact
- **Location**: Berlin, Germany (serving DACH region and international clients)
- **Website**: https://z-flow.de
- **Email**: hello@z-flow.de (English) | hallo@z-flow.de (German)
- **LinkedIn**: https://www.linkedin.com/company/z-flow/

## Pricing Overview
| Service | Starting Price | Timeline |
|---------|---------------|----------|
| MVP Development | €15,000 | 2-6 weeks |
| Automation (n8n/Make.com) | €3,000 | 1-3 weeks |
| Training/Workshop | €1,500 | Half to multi-day |
| Monthly Retainer | €4,000/month | Ongoing |
